column3: “Hands down my favorite weed of all time. This is what I thought smoking weed would he like before I actually started. It's the ideal strain! I'm so creative, more intellectual, and not zoned out! Perfect....”
“I smoked this nonstop when I had strep throat and I swear it cured me.”

“Nice strain for depression and stress.  Mood/mind altering for sure.  Will give you even more patients to deal with stressors.

Mid to heavy dose relieves depression, social anxieties & stress.  

Strain also warms the body and mind; great for arousal.

Decent energy and makes music even more bitchin'.”

“The high was one of the most pleasent experiences I've ever had. I grew outdoors, picked a bud off the plant and lit it up. My day immediately brightned I got that warm feeling of being at peace with the world.  It's an experience non-pot smokers will never feel and that's unfortunate. That part of the high only lasted about an hour but I felts its effects for hours later.”
“Very good bud. Very dry and a good focused high - easy to smoke and hits you well”
“best ever period”

“I had never heard of this strain until my buddy handed me a massive quantity and told me to stick my face in it and inhale deeply. I instantly fell in love as I do with all the different Haze's..it's safe to say that I'm a Hazy kinda person ;] It absolutely stinks, deeply and thoroughly. The high is pleasantly mellow, deep [like the smell], leaving you with the [sometimes dreaded] burn-out effect. This strain does wh...”
“Tastes and smells amazing. Strong uplifting buzz, great for mornings or when you need to get stuff done.”
“Tastes and smells amazing. Strong uplifting buzz, great for mornings or when you need to get stuff done.”

“This is a very powerful smoke. The taste is terrible, but on the plus side it doesn't take much. I can only relate my first experience of this strain to that of mushrooms. I heard subtle noises all around me, my mind would race, and every time I closed my eyes I saw techno color images swirling about. I wouldn't recommend this for a novice. My only thoughts on the reviews which stated this to be a weak smoke are that...”

“not a bad high....kinda mellow.. but decently long lasting.
over all i liked it ! taste was very smooth. easy on the old lungs !”

“I picked up and O of what the person claimed was this, for 4/20. Very excited to be able to smoke it all day without wanting to pass out. Smoked about a gram of it already and it's very potent, the scent is strong lemon and diesel, taste is earthy, spicy, a true haze. As my girl friend and I both put it, this bud takes you to a different place than most any other buds do.”
“I have shatter made from this and it is one of the best i have ever dabbed so euphoric but not spacey makes you really want to get shit done. Amazing wake n bake strain”
“Took me down from a brutal anxiety attack. Will now be a staple in my supply cabinet”
“Love this Sativa dom, perfect for a wake and bake, uplifting happy high, that has long lasting effects in my top 5 sativa's for sure!”

“This is my favourite strain of weed. It is a great tasting smoke and I would recommend it to anyone. The buzz you get is long lasting and very interesting, it's unlike other buds I've smoked. Nice in a joint and as a blunt.”

“This is my favourite strain of weed. It is a great tasting smoke and I would recommend it to anyone. The buzz you get is long lasting and very interesting, it's unlike other buds I've smoked. Nice in a joint and as a blunt.”
“Love this Sativa dom, perfect for a wake and bake, uplifting happy high, that has long lasting effects in my top 5 sativa's for sure!”
“Very clear headed”

“Neville's Haze is an above-average Haze strain, with effects that lean toward the weightless cerebral kind, which I'm told are redolent of the earlier Haze varieties. The particular strain that I tried was one that was crossed with a variety called citrus haze
column4: which combine to create a highly pleasant lime flavor, which with the natural lemony flavor of Neville's Haze makes for delicious vapor bag and smoke. I fin...”

column3: “Good body buzz and chilling feeling. A thinkers weed.”

“this strain has become one of my fave one amongst the sativas I've tried so far. helps with treating pain and it will make you talkative and social in general. it smokes very soft and u get a long lasting cerebral high.”
“Oh man, delicious and incredibly potent. Also the hairiest nugget I have ever seen.”
“sexy strain!!”
“sexy strain!!”

“Just picked this up after doing a ton of research on Frankincense smelling strains...I have only smoked it outdoors so still don't have a good read on that part.  The high is almost immediate upon exhale & relaxed/mellow on the whole.  Looking forward to smoking more of this.”

“very very strong haze,tryed this for my first weed in Amsterdam put a nice bud in the pipe smoked it and it hit me like a ton of bricks,very trippy weed,had to go back to hotel to try snap out of it,thought everyone was looking at me.all i can say is be aware”

“Smoking this one tasted like smoking alfalfa, both in smell and taste. 

It also leaves me giggly, euphoric, and slightly numb in body. It also leaves me less talkative.”

“I've recently come to find out that this strain is a Sativa dominate hybrid, as opposed by my previous journal entry [In which I stated this was an Indica, derp]. All I have to say is, along with MotherShip, this is my new favourite hybrid. It's got that dominate awesome heady high, while keeping it super mellow with a strong indica. A perfect yin/yang of sorts. I've also recently learned the lineage of this strain.....”
“Very clear headed”

“I must say that I was not impressed by it. A very clear head high, I felt very focused and able to do everything normal. It was like you feel the sensation in your head but you are still there a bit behind the eyes, deeper in your head. It is hard to describe. I felt a bit tingly in my fingers and talking was the best thing to do on this strain. However, like I said some other haze hybrids are stronger and last longe...”
“Loverly smoke”
“Sweet tasting bud, which gets you rocked!”
“by far my fav sativa.”

“It's very rare that I come across a strain I absolutely dislike to the fullest, and unfortunately this strain falls in that category. Neville's Haze did not look like the greatest bud, a sativa-like plant structure that looked and felt way too light and fluffy. I did like the scent, as it was presented with hints of sweetness and flowers. And upon exhale I did taste a bit of of that fuel/diesel flavor. I guess it def...”

“Uplifting and energetic high but left more to be desired. Flavour was lacking but was perfect for a productive day. Sedation was unfortunately short lived, something longer lasting would’ve been better IMO.”

“This has got to be one of my favorite strains I have smoked. It definitely makes me feel comfortable in  my own skin. The conversation I had with my SO who was also under it’s amazing effects Was great, I felt great and up but was still able to enjoy things and not be super spacy. Great strain 10/10”

“Legally Home grown- from feminized seed, MSNL seedbank. My first grow. Lots of lessons and very ugly buds due to my mistakes. Live and learn. Still smokes decent. I have the citrus and flowery, no sweetness on mine.  1 bong rip with coffee and I’m set till afternoon, so nice clear headed high, knocks the edge off my arthritis, puts me in a better mood about the remaining pain. No sluggishness or couch lock, and color...”
“smoking this now and I feel so HAPPY! and my back pain is GONE! i love this strain 😍💚🦄”
“Real Deal🔥🔥🔥”
“BLORTZ MIXUM GRAPE APE TROPICAL BINARY SYSTEM LORD CRISPY FOREST FLOWERY FORCE...”

“Very clear headed.  Somewhat short lasting.
Has it's place!”
“nice grade”

“From first hit to first walk, floated along the canals and had wide guided eyes. The taste and the smell took me back to the late 80s and reminded me of that lost scent and taste that has been missing from the good earth for so long
column4: due to all these hybrids. All good
column5: Neville has taken me back to the good old haze!!!!!

column3:
“A very good strain,  in the top 20!!!
Really energetic and euphoric make your high a wonderful experience. Good for the day make you funny and good for the relations.
I suggest to all of you to try one time this beautiful strain !”
“great strain, clear and focused high great for daytime and get-shit-done sessions”
“One of my favorite sativa, very energetic and uplifting ! good for smoking in the morning :)”
“taste,smell, and look are all amazing. cant find one bad thing to say of this other than i wish i had tried earlier.... its some strong shit with a pure sativa buzz.  love this strain.”
“One of my all-time favs. Fruity and tasty. Great uplifting happy med”

“it's awesome... in my personal opinion is the best sativa ever... you can feel so giggly and a social butterfly for a long time... definitely is the best... but be careful then you would be starving XD”

“This is a review on growing The seeds I bought from reputable dealer One came out hermaphrodite one didn't sprout so I ended up w one plant This plant needs 9 months from seed Harvested after New  Years Let you kniw more after it cures”
“By far one of my favourite strains 👌👌👌 this stuff gets u relaxed af”
“people who like diesel tasting strains will love this”
“always my #1 choice... love it!!! reminds me of the haze u get from the heights :)”
“Earthy, lemon, fruity. Made me talkative and giggly.  A good feel high.”
“Enjoyable.”
“Great Sativa! High energy, euphoric, def wake n bake.”

“What an odd smoke for me.  I vaped two ovens full with my Pax 2 and never really felt high.  What did happen is that I didn't fall asleep until 4:30 freaking AM.  This batch made me feel like not sleeping, with maybe a touch of relaxation, but not much much else.  I either got an odd batch or my tolerance is sky high.”

“This is top quality cannabis! I'm a daily smoker, bought a .5 gram preroll from Royal's Cannabis. 4 puffs and you're on your way. After about an hour it's starts whispering smoke me". Definitely a new favorite!”"

“Real focused creative burst

Hard to get thoughts from racing around my head through the pen and onto paper. 

Sustained creative energy and work”
“smoked this crossed with og kush super euphoric stress free high”
“great strain, but almost distractingly stimulating.  smell was amazing”
“Bought some of this recently in Amsterdam. Great, energetic high and good if you want to get things done too.”

“Yesterday I tried this wonderfull strain with My girlfriend. It had a great taste of Lemon and it's fantastic its low weight. It made us feel so happy and creative too, infact we started drawing and playing games and had really good time !”
“Excelnt for nighout!”
“This is one of my favorite strains! Uplifting, creative and energetic. Great for going on walks and for having a ton of fun at home! Awesome.”

“Had so much caffeine that I hit the ceiling in an I-wonder-if-my-heartbeat-is-infringing-on-Krewella-copyrights kind of way. This evened me out again.

I'll update this review in more favorable circumstances.”

“This review may not stay here only because I tested NV out last night and it put me to sleep. It may have been that I was running around for 9.5 hours at work and was already exhausted by the time I got home but I'm not the biggest fan so far. I'm going to give it another try when I'm Not so exhausted and hopefully I'll notice a difference but so far not a big fan :(. although I did get pretty hungry and ate a huge b...”

“Wasn't happy with her growth characteristics, but she does clone extremely well. I also read that she is hard to flower. That was not my experience. I grew 2 of these, one in soil, one in hydro. The hydro had too many issues and I eventually made clones out of her. Clones only took about a week to show massive amounts of root structure, was very pleased with that. The plant I grew in soil was 8 weeks old when I place...”
